reviews.review: it was everything I wanted to be but was shocked at the end.

I liked it a lot. It was nice to see the way the brought everything together. While the story did feel a little lacking at times they did a good job of balancing bringing in so many different characters and it did not feel very rushed.
It kicked ass. probably the best Avengers movie since the first one. In your face DC.
Very good movie that i have seen since Wonderwoman. The movie was able to provide equl time for most of the key characters in the movie. I can not wait to see Avengers 4.

Giant Monster Mash
This one is so dense, so action packed, so full of 'heroes', so full of plot lines you'd be forgiven for thinking, 'this might be a f**king disaster'. But you'd be wrong. The thing that stops everything spinning out of control is the central villain Thanos, and his desire to get all the infinity stones to carry out his genocidal scheme to save the universe from itself. That the CGI Josh Brolin is an eco- warrior makes the plot cohesive and acerbic, intelligent and conflicted. Even his ridiculous chin makes sense.
The Russo brothers hurl their heroes this way and that - thank God we know the story so far - if you don't, forget it, don't see this movie. No, this is for those of us who have seen the 10 years of Marvel and want to know - WTF is going on? Well, now we know. And it's the most ruthless film of its type, sacrificing heroes this way and that, sometimes for good, sometimes for the hell of it.
As this is clearly part one, we can tell the villain comes out on top - but in part two, he sure as hell will fail. Maybe all the fallen will be magically brought back to life? Bet on it.
Still, the Star Wars franchise over at Disney should take a peak at Marvel. No extraneous plot lines, no pc SJW feminism, just a 2/12 hour shot of popcorn munching adrenaline called an Avenger's movie. Of course it is extreme overload, but this is what I expected - and this is what it delivered. You have never seen anything like it and will amazed how much of it worked. Mind boggling eye candy.

Absolutely fantastic. I've seen every MCU film and this is part one of the final pay-off. I cried over three times in this film, then I cried later thinking about it. The emotion is great, the CGI fantastic, and performances superb.

Really went left from the comics on this one, the main point is there but new direction for the way the Avengers deal with Thanos. Pretty much exactly how I envisioned the movie will be, almost like Marvel's Empire Strikes Back in the universe. It'll be interesting to see where the go from here and what the plan will be with the way things were left. Lots of stuff going on in this movie!

Wow! What a great epic movie.  Last 10 years building to this film.  Lots of action and well timed humor.  Great drama and a masterful Villain.  I will have to see it a second time to digest what happened.
While so many critics somehow find it one of the worst movies out there, Infinity War remains one of the greatest phenomena in the history of cinema. A must-see, even for non-fans.
Worth the wait and one of the greatest endings too a movie. Hey DC this is how you make a movie!
